parameter.name: campaignId
parameter.description: The campaign ID to pull stats for.

parameter.name: trackingid
parameter.description: The tracking id used in campaign links.

parameter.name: start
parameter.description: Control paging of lists, start results at this list #, defaults to 1st page of data (page 0).

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Control paging of lists, number of lists to return with each call, defaults to 25 (max=100).

parameter.name: sortField
parameter.description: Created (the created date, default) or web (the display order in the web app). Invalid values will fall back on created - case insensitive.

parameter.name: sortDirection
parameter.description: DESC for descending (default), ASC for Ascending.
